attributes.action: Ensure government reduces red tape and rids society of the blame and 'ambulance chaser' culture that stops citizens taking responsibilty for themselves
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We are living in a country where you are watched all the time and everything is made more difficult than it should be for us to work, play and continue in our lives. Businesses are particularly affected. In many sectors the market should run itself and trust consumers to make the right decisions!! One of the first things that would help this is if we were all encouraged to take responsibility for ourselves rather than partake in the blame culture, ambulance chaser society we live in! Lets not make it such a perfect world for Lawyers!!!
